name: clancraft-army-manager
description: A fullstack app made using Vue.js/Tailwind and Express.js/Node to manage armies of states of the game "Clancraft" for the server 7GCraft.

scripts.serve: concurrently " cd frontend && vue-cli-service serve " "cd backend && nodemon index.js"
scripts.serve-prod: concurrently "cd frontend && serve -s dist " "cd backend && node index.js"

author: WryanCartie, ExtremeBip
